translations: v.打；脱逃（lam 第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Wooden lams should never overlap the interlocking elements.
sentences.translation: 木质层压板绝不可以(部份)覆盖互锁元件。

sentences.sentence: Objective:To study the effects of LAMS on modulation of HL-60 cell strain.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究昆布多糖硫酸酯（LAMS）对急性髓性白血病HL - 6 0细胞株的调控作用。

sentences.sentence: People began to use LAMS to conduct the instructional design and applied to the field of education and teaching.
sentences.translation: 人们开始利用LAMS进行教学设计并将其应用于教育教学领域。
